title: Hakuryuu
description:
Description :
        Tatsuya Shirakawa, also known as Hakuryu, has established the Kurosu-gumi as a significant force in Shibuya's underground scene. His approach is uncompromising and lacks morality as he employs a ruthless range of skills. He displays a resolute personality with no hesitation in the face of adversity, making him a captivating yakuza leader. Unfortunately, the Tenwakai conflict jeopardizes their operations. Can Hakuryu and the Kurosu-gumi overcome this challenge and emerge even stronger?
(Source: Nihonbungeisha, translated)
